Title: Directs the department of agriculture and markets to establish a grading system
Summary: Directs the department of agriculture and markets to establish a grading system for retail food stores, food service establishments and food warehouses.
LawCode: Add ยง501, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a grading system for retail food stores, food service establishments and food warehouses
